title: Elo hell.
body: Recently my MMR has become so bad that no matter what i do to win i can't seem to win except when i duo with literally someone from platinum+ as they smurf down in bronze, unfair i know but still discouraging that i can only win that way. I checked in normals to see how i do, i had a couple of my friends look at how i played in replays and they said i was able to win game if i had decent players which brings me to the next section of MMR. I'm silver 5 with a bronze 3 mmr (labeled elo hell by op.gg) and i keep getting worse and worse teammates to play with while my opponents are ALL silver 3 and higher. i can't carry in any role because i'm getting 12 man bot lane and 15 man mid lane every time i play this stupid stupid game. How do i climb on my own by fucking them before they can fuck me?

replies.body: what the hell is 15 man mid lane?
It's an exaggeration. It basically means that bot lane and top lane lost their towers already on my team and it's 5 people in my lane and no one is helping me defend the turret.
You just have to pray and hope the match making system puts you on the winning team.

league match making giving me a good team after what, 30 games of losing? classic! here's my op.gg. I used to be 70% win rate :)
http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=FiredUpLetsRock
